Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player

  • public class Player
extends Object
    The Player class is used to create and modify players. Players can then be added to the club
    Author:
    Gary Carr

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(String fullName)
      The constructor for Player class takes a players full name and then creates the player.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(String fullName)
        The constructor for Player class takes a players full name and then creates the player. The method setName then checks if the name entered is valid.
        Parameters:
        name - This param is user inputted, and takes the players full name

    • Method Detail

      • getAge

        public int getAge()
        This method compares the current date (now) to the players date of birth to get the current age of the player
        Returns:
        The players current age

      • getDOB

        public String getDOB()
        Method gets the players date of birth
        Returns:
        This returns the date of birth in a string format

      • scoredXGoals

        public void scoredXGoals(int g)
        This method allows the user to enter how many goals the player has scored, and it updates their current goal tally.
        Parameters:
        g - This takes the number of goals the player has scored and adds to goalTally

      • setDOB

        public void setDOB(Player p,
          int date,
          int month,
          int year)
        This method sets the date of birth of the player, and sets against the bd calendar. If a player is less than 16 or more than 45 the user is put into the while loop and prompted to double check the date is correct. The date of birth is then converted into a String DOB which uses format to display correctly
        Parameters:
        p - This is the player object which is being modified
        date - This is the day the player was born
        month - This is the month the player was born
        year - This is the year the player was born

      • setHeight

        public void setHeight(double h)
        This method allows a user to input a players height. While loop checks the height must be between 50cm and 250cm.
        Parameters:
        h - This takes the players height and updates the player object accordingly

      • setName

        public void setName(String fullName)
        This method checks the players full name. A while loop is used to check that the players name is over 3 characters, and if not the user asked to confirm if this is correct
        Parameters:
        fullName - This is the players name, the field is created in the Player constructor and passed to this method.

      • testPlayer

        public static void testPlayer()
        This is a testing method to test the above methods work. Each test gives in text what the answer should be, a demonstration of the answer, and then a coding test to ensure that Java confirms the answers are correct

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
